name: part_009
file: tmp_[#AkiRoseBirthday2021] 3D birthday celebration in my first idol costume! [HoloLive⧸AkiRose] [1Ts7X3vtYgQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Akirose performs the final part of her song on stage with green penlights waving in the crowd.
MC section. Akirose catches her breath after the performance and tells the audience she has written a letter to them.
Akirose reads her heartfelt letter to the 'Rosetai' (her fans) while the text of the letter is displayed on screen.

subtitles.original: あぁ...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 貴方に出会いたくて 輝いて私が生まれて
subtitles.english: Because I wanted to meet you, I was born shining

subtitles.original: 愛すればこそ 愛あればこそ
subtitles.english: Only because I love, only because there's love

subtitles.original: 希望のない奇跡を待って どうなるの
subtitles.english: What happens if I wait for a miracle without hope?

subtitles.original: 涙に滲む 星の瞬きは怖...
subtitles.english: The twinkling of stars, blurred by tears, is scary...

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わってまた巡り逢えるなら
subtitles.english: If I'm reborn and we can meet again

subtitles.original: その時もきっと私を見つけて
subtitles.english: Please be sure to find me then, too

subtitles.original: そしてもう二度と放さないで捕まえてて
subtitles.english: And please don't let me go ever again, hold me tight

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないと囁いて星プラネット
subtitles.english: Whisper that I'm not alone, Star Planet

subtitles.original: はぁ... はぁ...
subtitles.english: Haa... haa...

subtitles.original: あぁ、聞いてくれてありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you for listening.

subtitles.original: えー、そろそろ配信もね、ラストの方のお時間になってきました。
subtitles.english: Well, it's almost time for the stream to end.

subtitles.original: えー、ここでアキロゼから
subtitles.english: Well, I've written a letter from Akirose

subtitles.original: ロゼ隊のみんなに手紙を書いてきたので...
subtitles.english: to all the Rosetai...

subtitles.original: ...せっかくのね、こういう機会なので読んでもいいですか？
subtitles.english: ...so since it's a special occasion, may I read it?

subtitles.original: お願いします。
subtitles.english: Please.

subtitles.original: 緊張した。ふふ。
subtitles.english: I was nervous. Hehe.

subtitles.original: 緊張したけど上手くできたかな？
subtitles.english: I was nervous, but did I do well?

subtitles.original: ロゼ隊のみんなへ
subtitles.english: To all the Rosetai,

subtitles.original: いつも応援してくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you for always supporting me.

subtitles.original: アキロゼがここまで続けてこれたのは...
subtitles.english: The reason Akirose has been able to come this far...

subtitles.original: ...出会ってくれたロゼ隊の力のおかげです。
subtitles.english: ...is thanks to the power of the Rosetai who found me.

subtitles.original: 何気ない言葉に傷ついたり...
subtitles.english: Getting hurt by casual words...

subtitles.original: ...思うようにできなかったり...
subtitles.english: ...not being able to do things as I wanted...

subtitles.original: 高くて大きくて超えられそうにない壁にぶつかったり...
subtitles.english:
Hitting walls that are so high and large
that they seem impossible to overcome...

subtitles.original: うまく何もできない自分が本当に
subtitles.english: There are still times when I feel really pathetic

subtitles.original: 情けなくなっちゃうこともよく、まだあります。
subtitles.english: for not being able to do anything well.

subtitles.original: でも、そんな時も...
subtitles.english: But, even at those times...

subtitles.original: ...いつも配信とか...
subtitles.english: ...always in streams...

subtitles.original: ...TwitterとかYouTubeとかコメントでね...
subtitles.english: ...or in the comments on Twitter and YouTube...

subtitles.original: ...優しい言葉をかけてくれる...
subtitles.english: ...you give me kind words...

subtitles.original: ...そして盛り上げてくれるロゼ隊がいます。
subtitles.english: ...and the Rosetai are there to cheer me up.

subtitles.original: 配信をすると、みんなと触れ合うと、アキロゼは元気が出ます。
subtitles.english:
When I stream, when I interact with everyone,
Akirose feels energized.

subtitles.original: だからアキロゼは...
subtitles.english: That's why Akirose...

subtitles.original: ...みんなが疲れちゃった時とか...
subtitles.english: ...when everyone is tired...

subtitles.original: ...あとはね、繰り返しの日常に彩りを添えられるような...
subtitles.english:
...and, so I can add color to your repetitive
daily lives...

subtitles.original: ...VTuberになりたいと思うことができました。
subtitles.english: ...I've come to want to be a VTuber.

subtitles.original: この誕生日を迎えて220歳のピチピチエルフになりましたが...
subtitles.english:
I've turned into a fresh 220-year-old elf on this
birthday, but...

subtitles.original: ...まだまだVTuberとして...
subtitles.english: ...as a VTuber...

subtitles.original: ...一人の、生きる、この生命体として半人前です。
subtitles.english: ...I'm still a novice as an individual living life form.

subtitles.original: 来年も、またこうやってみんなと最高を更新していけるような...
subtitles.english:
Next year, to be able to keep breaking
my personal bests with everyone...

subtitles.original: ...バースデーを迎えていけるように...
subtitles.english: ...so I can welcome such a birthday...

subtitles.original: アキロゼはね、アイドルとしても、ダンスや歌...
subtitles.english: Akirose, you know, as an idol, with dance and song...

subtitles.original: ...そして日常の配信とかね...
subtitles.english: ...and daily streams...

subtitles.original: ...みんなに楽しんでもらえるように...
subtitles.english: ...so everyone can enjoy themselves...
